import React from "react"; import ProgressBar from '../../components/ProgressBar'; import data from '../../assets/home/icons/Tours/date.svg'; import time from '../../assets/home/icons/Tours/time.svg'; import Tuscany from '../../DB/Tuscany.json'; import {setTime,setDate,adultPrice,childPrice,infantPrice, adultCost,childCost,infantCost, decrease,increase,value} from '../../slices/tourSlice'; import { useDispatch,useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default function BookingDetails () { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const selectedTime = useSelector((state) => state.datepicker.selectedTime); const selectedDate = useSelector((state) => state.datepicker.selectedDate); const adultPrice = useSelector((state) => state.tour.adultPrice); const childPrice = useSelector((state) => state.tour.childPrice); const infantPrice = useSelector((state) => state.tour.infantPrice); const adultCost = useSelector((state) => state.tour.adultCost); const childCost = useSelector((state) => state.tour.childCost); const infantCost = useSelector((state) => state.tour.infantCost); const value = useSelector((state) => state.tour.value); return(
{/* */}
